TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeView extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 显示标记项的分层集合，每个标记项用一个 来表示。

span.span: Displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合保存所有对象分配给控件。The collection holds all the objects that are assigned to the control. 此集合中的树节点称为根树节点。The tree nodes in this collection are referred to as the root tree nodes. 任何后来添加到根树节点的树节点被称为子节点。Any tree node that is subsequently added to a root tree node is referred to as a child node. 因为每个可以包含其他集合对象，你可能发现很难确定你的树状结构中的位置，当循环访问集合。Because each can contain a collection of other objects, you might find it difficult to determine your location in the tree structure when you iterate through the collection. 你可以分析使用字符串字符串值以确定位置标签的起始和结束。You can parse the string by using the string value to determine where a label begins and ends. 您可以通过分配中显示的树节点旁的图像到属性和引用的索引值中来分配该。You can display images next to the tree nodes by assigning an to the property and referencing the index value of an in the to assign that . 使用以下属性分配图像：Use the following properties to assign images: - 设置属性的索引值你想要在不在选定树节点时显示。Set the property to the index value of the that you want to display when a tree node is not selected. - 设置属性的索引值你想要在选定树节点时显示。Set the property to the index value of the that you want to display when a tree node is selected. 引用的图像和属性值是分配给所有树节点都显示的默认图像集合。The images referenced by the and property values are the default images displayed by all the tree nodes that are assigned to the collection. 每个树节点可以通过设置重写默认映像和属性。Individual tree nodes can override the default images by setting the and properties. 在显示的状态图像是默认情况下的 16 x 16 像素。The state images displayed in the are 16 x 16 pixels by default. 设置属性将它们对如何显示映像没有影响。Setting the property of the will have no effect on how the images are displayed. 但是，状态图像将调整根据系统 DPI 设置 app.config 文件包含以下条目：However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` 可以展开树节点以显示子树节点的下一个级别。Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes. 用户可以展开通过单击加号 （+） 按钮，如果旁边显示，或可以展开通过调用方法。The user can expand the by clicking the plus-sign (+) button, if one is displayed next to the , or you can expand the by calling the method. 若要展开中的所有子树节点级别集合，请调用方法。To expand all the child tree node levels in the collection, call the method. 可以折叠子级别通过调用方法或用户可以按减号 （-） 按钮，如果旁边显示。You can collapse the child level by calling the method, or the user can press the minus-sign (-) button, if one is displayed next to the . 你还可以调用展开和折叠状态之间切换的方法。You can also call the method to alternate between the expanded and collapsed states. 树节点可以选择性地显示复选框。Tree nodes can optionally display check boxes. 若要显示对应的复选框，设置属性到`true`。To display the check boxes, set the property of the to `true`. 属性设置为`true`处于选中状态的树节点。The property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state. > [!NOTE] > 设置属性中的或事件导致被多次引发该事件，并且可能导致意外行为。Setting the property from within the or event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior. 例如，你可能会设置事件处理程序中时以递归方式更新的子节点，以便用户不必展开，然后检查每个单独的属性。For example, you might set the property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually. 若要防止被多次引发事件，请将逻辑添加到你的事件处理程序才会执行递归代码属性未设置为。To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the property of the is not set to . 有关如何执行此操作的示例，请参阅示例部分或事件。For an example of how to do this, see the Example section of the or events. 你可以更改的外观通过设置部分显示和样式属性的控件。You can change the appearance of the control by setting some of its display and style properties. 设置到`true`显示每个旁边的加号或减号按钮，可以展开或折叠，分别。Setting to `true` displays a plus-sign or minus-sign button next to each that can be expanded or collapsed, respectively. 设置属性`true`导致显示联接在一起的所有根树节点的行。Setting the property to `true` causes the to display lines that join all the root tree nodes together. 可以显示线条来连接到其根节点的子树节点，通过设置属性`true`。You can display lines that connect child tree nodes to their root node by setting the property to `true`. 设置属性`true`的树节点标签的外观当鼠标指针移过的更改。Setting the property to `true` changes the appearance of the tree node labels as the mouse pointer passes over them. 在热跟踪，树节点标签采用超链接的外观。When hot-tracked, the tree node labels take on the appearance of a hyperlink. 你可以完全自定义的外观控件。You can also completely customize the appearance of the control. 若要执行此操作，将设置属性的值以外的其他并处理事件。To do this, set the property to a value other than and handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 设置时， ， ，和属性在运行时，重新创建句柄 (请参阅) 以更新控件的外观。When setting the , , , and properties at run time, the handle is recreated (see ) to update the control's appearance. 这将导致所有树节点，除所选折叠。This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the control. [!code-csharp[TreeViewMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewMisc/cs/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[TreeViewMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewMisc/vb/form1.vb#10)] 更复杂的以下代码示例显示中的客户信息控件。The following, more complex code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单编号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新绘制的抑制的使用和方法和等待显示时创建并绘制对象。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求你拥有`Customer`可以容纳的集合的对象`Order`对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还要求你具有名为的光标文件`MyWait.cur`具有在应用程序目录，并创建的一个实例控制上。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，所有节点都展开之后，并处理程序添加了针对事件。First, all the nodes are expanded, and a handler is added for the event. 接下来，所有的节点会折叠。Next, all the nodes are collapsed. 事件处理程序确定在给定的节点是否具有签入的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果一个节点已选中的子节点，折叠将取消该节点。If a node has checked children, the collapse is canceled for that node. 单击节点旁边的减号时，以便标准节点折叠然后删除事件处理程序。In order to allow standard node collapse when the minus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此外可以通过处理实现此行为事件，该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2/CPP/treeviewshowcheckednodes2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2/CS/treeviewshowcheckednodes2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2/VB/treeviewshowcheckednodes2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表有助于您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`TreeView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TreeView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用户可以通过编辑非根树节点。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标，该位置确定和存储在变量名为`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了非根树节点，它会处于可编辑状态，这样用户就可以编辑此节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label. 在用户停止编辑树节点标签后，新的标签文本计算，并保存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 对于此示例中，有几个字符被视为不在标签文本中有效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果标签字符串中的无效字符之一是或字符串为空，则会通知用户的错误和标签返回到其以前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消选定节点时，此事件不会发生。This event does not occur when the node is unselected. 若要检测是否已清除所选内容，你可以测试属性。To detect whether the selection was cleared, you can test the property. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用枚举。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration. 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码中一个包含窗体控件名为`TreeView1`。To run this example, paste the following code in a form that contains a control named `TreeView1`. 此示例需要`TreeView1`填充有一些项和事件连接到在此示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example requires that `TreeView1` is populated with items and the event is connected to the event handler defined in the sample. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，所有节点都展开之后，并处理程序添加了针对事件。First, all the nodes are expanded, and a handler is added for the event. 接下来，所有的节点会折叠。Next, all the nodes are collapsed. 事件处理程序确定在给定的节点是否具有签入的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果一个节点已选中的子节点，折叠将取消该节点。If a node has checked children, the collapse is canceled for that node. 单击节点旁边的减号时，以便标准节点折叠然后删除事件处理程序。In order to allow standard node collapse when the minus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此外可以通过处理实现此行为事件，该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 有关完整示例，请参阅构造函数参考主题。For the complete example, see the constructor reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，所有节点均折叠都起来，并处理程序添加了针对事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added for the event. 接下来，所有节点会展开。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件处理程序确定在给定的节点是否具有签入的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果节点不具有已选中的子级，则取消该节点的扩展。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 单击节点旁边的加号时，以便标准的节点展开然后删除事件处理程序。In order to allow standard node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此外可以通过处理实现此行为事件，该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 有关完整示例，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要维护性能，而项被添加到一次一个地，调用方法。To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the , call the method. 的方法阻止从之前的绘制控件调用方法。The method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 将项添加到树视图控件的首选的方式是使用方法将添加到树视图的树节点项的数组。The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view. 但是，如果你想要一次添加一个项目，使用方法，以阻止添加操作期间进行绘制的控件。However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the method to prevent the control from painting during the add operations. 若要允许继续绘制的控件，调用方法时所有树节点已都添加到树视图。To allow the control to resume painting, call the method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示中的客户信息控件。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单编号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新绘制的抑制的使用和方法和等待显示时创建并绘制对象。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求你拥有`Customer`可以容纳的集合的对象`Order`对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还要求你具有名为的光标文件`MyWait.cur`具有在应用程序目录，并创建的一个实例控制上。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 左侧的树节点标签和树节点显示一个复选框，如果任何。A check box is displayed to the left of both the tree node label and tree node , if any. 复选框允许用户一次选择多个树节点。Check boxes allow the user to select more than one tree node at a time. 当属性设置为`true`，和设置属性时，每个中包含显示的第一个和第二个图像以指示取消选中或选中状态，分别。When the property of a is set to `true`, and the property is set, each that is contained in the displays the first and second images from the to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively. 但是，显示的图像可能会出现以下情况时不同： 如果节点的设置为 0 或 1，以外的值与的父属性设置为`false`、不将自动重置为-1 以指示未设置。However, the displayed images may be different if the following situation occurs: If the of the node is set to a value other than 0 or 1, and the property of the parent is set to `false`, the will not automatically reset to -1 to indicate it is not set. 在这种情况下，显示指示的索引位置处的状态图像。In this case, the state image at the indicated index position is shown. 如果设置为`true`同样，第一个和第二个图像的显示以分别指示选中或取消选中状态。If is set to `true` again, the first and second images of the are shown to indicate a checked or unchecked state, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 设置时属性在运行时，重新创建句柄 (请参阅) 以更新控件的外观。When setting the property at run time, the handle is recreated (see ) to update the control's appearance. 这将导致所有树节点除了所选折叠。This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，所有节点均折叠都起来，并处理程序添加了针对事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added for the event. 接下来，所有节点会展开。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件处理程序确定在给定的节点是否具有签入的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果节点不具有已选中的子级，则取消该节点的扩展。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 单击节点旁边的加号时，以便标准的节点展开然后删除事件处理程序。In order to allow standard node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此外可以通过处理实现此行为事件，该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法折叠所有对象，其中包括所有子树节点，包含在控件。The method collapses all the objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the control. > [!NOTE] > 状态仍然存在。The state of a persists. 例如，假设你调用根树节点的方法。For example, suppose that you call the method for a root tree node. 如果先前没有折叠子树节点，它们将显示在其先前的展开状态。If the child tree nodes were not previously collapsed, they will appear in their previously-expanded state. 调用方法可确保所有树节点都显示在折叠状态。Calling the method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，所有节点均折叠都起来，并处理程序添加了针对事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added for the event. 接下来，所有节点会展开。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件处理程序确定在给定的节点是否具有签入的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果节点不具有已选中的子级，则取消该节点的扩展。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 单击节点旁边的加号时，以便标准的节点展开然后删除事件处理程序。In order to allow standard node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此外可以通过处理实现此行为事件，该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 有关完整示例，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 节点通常由操作系统绘制。The nodes of a are typically drawn by the operating system. 属性允许你自定义节点的外观。The property lets you customize the appearance of the nodes. 若要执行此操作，将设置到或和提供的处理程序事件。To do this, set to or and provide a handler for the event. 这称为所有者描述。This is called owner drawing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义使用所有者描述的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 在示例中的控件将显示标准节点标签旁边的可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 通过使用指定节点标记属性。Node tags are specified by using the property. 控件还使用自定义颜色，包括自定义突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, which include a custom highlight color. 你可以自定义的大多数颜色设置颜色属性，但选择突出显示颜色不能作为属性。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形扩展仅解决节点标签。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 要绘制的节点标记，并绘制自定义的突出显示矩形大到足以容纳一个节点标记，则必须使用所有者描述。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 有关完整示例，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此事件来自定义中的节点的外观使用所有者描述的控件。Use this event to customize the appearance of nodes in a control using owner drawing. 将引发此事件仅当属性设置为值或。This event is raised only when the property is set to values of or . 下表指示了可以进行自定义当属性设置为这些值。The following table indicates how the can be customized when the property is set to these values. |DrawMode 属性值DrawMode property value|TreeNode 自定义项TreeNode customization| |-----------------------------|----------------------------| ||可以自定义标签区域。The label area can be customized. 所有其他自动绘制元素。All other elements are drawn automatically.| ||完整的外观可以自定义。The appearance of the entire can be customized. 图标、 复选框，加号和减号情况下，并连接节点的线必须根据需要手动绘制。Icons, check boxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes must be drawn manually if they are desired.| 区域的该值所占用如果已使用由指定的字体绘制控件的属性是在其中可以单击节点以将其选中的区域。The region that the value would occupy if it were drawn using the font specified by the control's property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it. 这称为命中的测试区域。This is called the hit test region. 如果你绘制此区域外，你应提供你自己选择节点，单击其可见区域时的代码。If you draw outside this region, you should provide your own code that selects a node when its visible area is clicked. 对应于命中的测试区域属性时使用。The hit test region corresponds to the property when using . 使用时，但属性包含的整个宽度。When using , however, the property encompasses the entire width of the . 在这种情况下，你可以通过获取访问命中的测试区域值并访问其属性。In this case, you can access the hit test region by getting the value and accessing its property. 然后，您可以绘制这些边界内的节点的命中的测试区域，也可以提供你自己的命中的测试代码。You can then draw the hit test region of the node within these bounds, or you can provide your own hit test code. 请注意，设置属性不会更改的命中的测试区域，使用指定的字体为整个计算大小。Note that setting the property does not change the size of the hit test region, which is calculated using the font specified for the entire . 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义使用所有者描述的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 在示例中的控件将显示标准节点标签旁边的可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 通过使用指定节点标记属性。Node tags are specified by using the property. 控件还使用自定义颜色，包括自定义突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, which include a custom highlight color. 你可以自定义的大多数颜色设置颜色属性，但选择突出显示颜色不能作为属性。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形扩展仅解决节点标签。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 要绘制的节点标记，并绘制自定义的突出显示矩形大到足以容纳一个节点标记，则必须使用所有者描述。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在示例中，处理程序节点标记和自定义选择突出显示手动事件绘制。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义项。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 对于这些数据，属性设置为`true`以便将由操作系统绘制它们。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 此外，处理程序事件提供命中测试。Additionally, a handler for the event provides hit-testing. 默认情况下，可以通过单击其标签周围的区域选择一个节点。By default, a node can be selected only by clicking the region around its label. 事件处理程序选择一个节点，在此区域内或解决节点标记，区域内任意位置单击，如果存在。The event handler selects a node that is clicked anywhere within this region or within the region around a node tag, if present. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要维护性能，而项被添加到一次一个地，调用方法。To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the , call the method. 的方法阻止从之前的绘制控件调用方法。The method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 将项添加到树视图控件的首选的方式是使用方法将添加到树视图的树节点项的数组。The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view. 但是，如果你想要一次添加一个项目，使用方法，以阻止添加操作期间进行绘制的控件。However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the method to prevent the control from painting during the add operations. 若要允许控件要恢复绘制的控件，调用方法时所有树节点已都添加到树视图。To allow control the control to resume painting, call the method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示中的客户信息控件。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单编号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新绘制的抑制的使用和方法和等待显示时创建并绘制对象。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求你拥有`Customer`可以容纳的集合的对象`Order`对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还要求你具有名为的光标文件`MyWait.cur`具有在应用程序目录，并创建的一个实例控制上。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将传递和坐标事件作为`x`和`y`参数。You can pass the and coordinates of the event as the `x` and `y` parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用户可以通过编辑非根树节点。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标，该位置确定和存储在变量名为`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了非根树节点，它会处于可编辑状态，这样用户就可以编辑此节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label. 在用户停止编辑树节点标签后，新的标签文本计算，并保存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 对于此示例中，有几个字符被视为不在标签文本中有效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果标签字符串中的无效字符之一是或字符串为空，则会通知用户的错误和标签返回到其以前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`false`，所选节点在控件仍会不同于当前所选内容的颜色突出显示颜色时控件失去焦点。When this property is set to `false`, selected nodes in the control remain highlighted in a different color than the current selection color when the control loses focus. 此属性可用于保留时在用户单击窗体上一个不同的控件，或将移动到不同的窗口由可见用户选定的项。You can use this property to keep items that are selected by the user visible when the user clicks a different control on the form or moves to a different window. > [!NOTE] > 如果你担心你的应用程序的可访问性，建议你设置属性`false`。If you are concerned with the accessibility of your applications, it is recommended that you set the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码中的窗体和调用`InitializeSelectedTreeView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeSelectedTreeView` method in the form's constructor or event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`、属性不起作用。If the property is set to `true`, the property has no effect. > [!NOTE] > 当属性设置为`true`，每个树节点标签都将当鼠标指针移超链接的外观，通过它。When the property is set to `true`, each tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it. 字体样式应用于和设置为蓝色，从而使显示为链接的标签。The font style is applied to the and the is set to blue to make the label appear as a link. 外观不由用户的操作系统的 Internet 设置控制。The appearance is not controlled by the Internet settings of the user's operating system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个自定义。The following code example illustrates a customized . 通过继承类，此自定义版本具有的典型的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical . 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供独特外观。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 因为属性设置为`false`，该自定义的控件还将重写方法，以便可以展开和折叠在被单击时节点。Because the property is set to `false`, the customized control also overrides the method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以这种方式自定义的控件可以使用整个组织，从而便于提供一致的接口，而无需在每个单独的项目中指定的控件属性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何中启用拖放操作控件。The following code example demonstrates how to enable drag-and-drop operations within a control. 在此示例中，可以将任何节点拖动到不被拖动节点的后代的另一个节点。In this example, any node can be dragged to another node that is not a descendant of the dragged node. 被拖动的节点，其中包括所有子代节点，将成为目标节点的子级。The dragged node, which includes all its descendant nodes, becomes a child of the destination node. 当使用鼠标左键时，拖动的节点移动到目标节点。When the left mouse button is used, the dragged node is moved to the destination node. 当使用鼠标右键按钮时，被拖动的节点复制到目标节点。When the right mouse button is used, the dragged node is copied to the destination node. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法才可以工作属性是`true`。The method works only if the property is `true`. 如果是`false`当你尝试编辑标签，将引发异常且树节点将不被放入到可编辑状态。If is `false` when you attempt to edit the label, an exception will be thrown and the tree node will not be put in to an editable state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用户可以通过编辑非根树节点。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标，该位置确定和存储在变量名为`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了非根树节点，它会处于可编辑状态，这样用户就可以编辑此节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label. 在用户停止编辑树节点标签后，新的标签文本计算，并保存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 对于此示例中，有几个字符被视为不在标签文本中有效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果标签字符串中的无效字符之一是或字符串为空，则会通知用户的错误和标签返回到其以前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户双击鼠标，包括加号 （+） 或减号 （-），该值指示节点是否是折叠或展开树任何的节点部分，将发生此事件。This event occurs when the user double-clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件以及如何使用。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and how to use the . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含名为`treeView1`。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form that contains a named `treeView1`. 填充`treeView1`中的文件的名称与`c:\`目录的系统运行此示例和相关联事件`treeView1`与`treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick`在此示例中的方法。Populate `treeView1` with the names of files located in the `c:\` directory of the system the sample is running on, and associate the event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick` method in this example. 此示例要求用户运行该示例的计算机上具有管理员特权。This example requires that the user has administrator privileges on the machine running the example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers/cpp/Form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果鼠标位于、事件发生一次之前事件。If the mouse is located over a , the event will occur before the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表有助于您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`TreeView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TreeView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取分配给树视图控件的树节点集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of tree nodes that are assigned to the tree view control.

value.span: ，表示分配给树视图控件的树节点。

span.span: A that represents the tree nodes assigned to the tree view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含的集合对象，其中每个可以包含其自己的属性。The property holds a collection of objects, each of which has a property that can contain its own . 此嵌套的树节点可能会使其难以导航树状结构，但属性，则可以更方便地确定你树状结构中的位置。This nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure, but the property makes it easier to determine your location within the tree structure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示中的客户信息控件。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单编号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新绘制的抑制的使用和方法和等待显示时创建并绘制对象。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求你拥有`Customer`可以容纳的集合的对象`Order`对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还要求你创建的实例控制上。It also requires that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`true`、忽略属性。If is set to `true`, the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个自定义。The following code example illustrates a customized . 通过继承类，此自定义版本具有的典型的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical . 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供独特外观。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 因为属性设置为 false，则该自定义的控件还将重写方法，以便可以展开和折叠在被单击时节点。Because the property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以这种方式自定义的控件可以使用整个组织，从而便于提供一致的接口，而无需在每个单独的项目中指定的控件属性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根树节点才旁边的加号和减号按钮出现属性值是`true`。The plus sign and minus sign buttons appear next to the root tree nodes only if the property value is `true`. 如果未显示的加号和减号按钮，没有视觉提示存在是为了指示树节点，包含子树节点并且是可扩展的。If the plus sign and minus sign buttons are not displayed, no visual cue exists to indicate that the tree node contains child tree nodes and is expandable. 然后，用户必须双击树节点以确定其是否包含子树节点，以将其展开，或将其折叠起来。The user then must double-click a tree node to determine whether it contains child tree nodes, to expand it, or to collapse it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个自定义。The following code example illustrates a customized . 通过继承类，此自定义版本具有的典型的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical . 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供独特外观。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 因为属性设置为 false，则该自定义的控件还将重写方法，以便可以展开和折叠在被单击时节点。Because the property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以这种方式自定义的控件可以使用整个组织，从而便于提供一致的接口，而无需在每个单独的项目中指定的控件属性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. summary.span: 对 控件中的项进行排序。

span.span: Sorts the items in control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重新应用默认排序，这是按字母顺序的节点文本或指定自定义排序属性。This method reapplies the default sort, which is alphabetical by node text, or a custom sort specified by the property. 如果更改现有节点的文本或节点被移动用户，并且你想要再次的项进行排序，可以使用此方法。You can use this method if the text of existing nodes is changed or nodes are moved by the user, and you want to sort the items again. > [!NOTE] > 使用默认排序方法基于应用程序所指定。The default sorter uses the method based on the specified by the application. 这意味着，具有相等的值对象保存在添加到的顺序控件。This means that objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the control. 此行为可能不同，如果应用自定义排序。This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指示的状态，将其设置属性并且还设置或每个属性。To indicate the state of a , set the property and also set the or property for each . 在显示的状态图像是默认情况下的 16 x 16 像素。The state images displayed in the are 16 x 16 pixels by default. 设置属性将它们对如何显示映像没有影响。Setting the property of the will have no effect on how the images are displayed. 但是，状态图像将调整根据系统 DPI 设置 app.config 文件包含以下条目：However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` 当属性设置为`true`和设置属性时，每个中包含显示的第一个和第二个图像以指示取消选中或选中状态，分别。When the property of a is set to `true` and the property is set, each that is contained in the displays the first and second images from the to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively. 应设置属性添加到节点之前以防止在没有状态图像的节点的设计时显示的状态图像设置。You should set the property before you add nodes to the to prevent state images being shown at design time for nodes that do not have a state image set. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`InitializeCheckTreeView`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeCheckTreeView` from the form's constructor or event handler.
